about_the_game:
In an alternate 1980s where North Korea won their war, Brooklyn lies in ruins. The streets are controlled by the Vires syndicate, operating under the facade of Virical Corporations. As a former detective whose brother was murdered while investigating Virical Corporations, you've made a fatal choice: injecting yourself with ISS, a deadly military-grade stimulant that grants superhuman abilities at the cost of your life.

KEY FEATURES:

• MASTER SUPERNATURAL MOVEMENT

Run, jump, and slide as you tear through urban battlegrounds. Your enhanced abilities make you unstoppable - if you can stay alive long enough to use them.

• EXPLORE A FRACTURED CITY

From neon-lit corporate towers to abandoned subway tunnels, every corner of this alternate Brooklyn tells a story of war, corruption, and resistance.

• UNLEASH YOUR ARSENAL

Wield an array of classic and experimental weapons, or use your bare fists to pummel your way through thug after thug.

• UNCOVER THE TRUTH

With guidance from a mysterious pyramid-shaped entity, dive deep into a conspiracy that blurs the lines between victim and villain, justice and revenge.

• WISHLIST!

If you like what you see here, please feel free to WISHLIST now, Thanks so much!

content_descriptors.notes:
This fast-paced action game contains:
Combat violence and gunplay with moderate blood effects
Themes involving drug use (fictional performance-enhancing drugs)
Dark themes including revenge, corruption, and conspiracy
References to murder and criminal organizations
Some mild language and dark humor
Themes of self-sacrifice (protagonist uses a dangerous drug that shortens lifespan)

name: Adrenaline Overdrive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In this retro-styled FPS, tear through an alternate 1980s Brooklyn as a vengeful detective enhanced by experimental drugs. Master supernatural movement abilities, and uncover the truth behind your brother's murder - before the power that drives you becomes your doom.
